content: update october 2021 - i have taken the decision to cease publishing patterns as of summer 2021 in the hope of moving on to something new i wanted to say a big thank you to everyone for the love my work has received over the years - it means more than you can imagine the free patterns that are on my blog will remain though all paid patterns from my ravelry store and etsy are no longer available if you would like to sell anything made from any of my past patterns - paid or free - you have my full blessing i don t require credit either as i am no longer using the esshaych name professionally i wish you all the best with the sales if you decide to do so thanks so much again - and i hope to see you again one day soon sarah -x- ------------------------------------------------------- a bright and cheerful traditional granny square pattern - this blanket can be made in any colour combination you choose and is ideal for a baby blanket/receiving blanket lap blanket sofa throw car blanket and many other uses once finished the blanket will measure approx 40 x 40 when using light worsted weight/dk yarn and a 4mm hook this blanket pattern can also be continued to make an even bigger final blanket - i e queen size or king size pattern calls for the following stitches chain stitch slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet and problems with the pattern whilst you are making it please don t hesitate to contact me and i will be happy to help many thanks for looking and happy crocheting
